The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Monkey Twins
programme.desc: After the tragic loss of his lover, Neua learns the Monkey Muay Thai skills and vows to avenge her death. His lover’s sister who practices Chinese Kung Fu, suspects Neua is responsible for her sister's death but later uncovers that she was killed by an organized crime ring. Together, they join forces to uphold justice and seek vengeance.

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Elimination Game
programme.desc: Navy SEAL Rick is sentenced to rot in a military prison until he is offered the opportunity to put his life on the line and win his freedom in a kill or be killed reality show. Rick will have to eliminate some of the world's most notorious killers on live TV to gain his freedom and clear his name. Can he succeed finally?

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Bangkok Storm
programme.desc: Underground boxer Lin Feng is hunted by the Bangkok triad when he refuses to fight in an illegal match. He escaped successfully but lost his memory. While Feng begins a new life, the triad finds him and hires a top boxer to beat him. As Feng suddenly regains his memory in the process, he vows to take down the triad.

programme.title: Extreme Ends

programme.title: CSI S5 E23 - Iced
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 171
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Guest host Melissa Clarke asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 171
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice - Elizabeth Chong
programme.desc: In this heartwarming episode, Australia's Queen of Chinese cooking Elizabeth Chong shares a fusion recipe close to her heart with her mother's macaroni dish. And Alice treats Elizabeth to a sweet dish special to her.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Not Welcome - Northern Ireland
programme.desc: In Ballymena, Northern Ireland locals wage a war on migrants, attacking their homes and running them out of town. There's speculation paramilitary groups are behind the mob violence, circulating hit lists of migrant's houses.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 265
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 149
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.title: Australian Volleyball Super League - Round 1 Men's: Adelaide v Canberra Highlights
programme.desc: Six state teams in the Australian Volleyball Super League battle it out for the 2025 title. On Mondays catch the men's teams on court, then on Wednesdays, the women's teams go head to head as every point counts.

programme.title: The World - Episode 149
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Buderim
programme.desc: Natalie and Stuart promise to save the soul of their "fixer-upper", but face obstacles with eccentric renovations that risk upsetting the old owners.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 29
programme.desc: Chas and John cover a monumental week in global affairs as world leaders descend on New York for the UN General Assembly, with Palestinian statehood and wars in Gaza and Ukraine high on the agenda.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Not Welcome - Northern Ireland
programme.desc: In Ballymena, Northern Ireland locals wage a war on migrants, attacking their homes and running them out of town. There's speculation paramilitary groups are behind the mob violence, circulating hit lists of migrant's houses.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 189
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 137
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 149
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.desc: Six state teams in the Australian Volleyball Super League battle it out for the 2025 title. On Mondays catch the men's teams on court, then on Wednesdays, the women's teams go head to head as every point counts.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 190
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 190
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 190
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice - Geraldine Hickey
programme.desc: Comedian Geraldine Hickey and Alice celebrate a divisive flavour, the controversial herb, coriander. Geraldine reminisces about her family's lamb roast, as together in the kitchen they whip up a minty lamb favourite.

programme.title: Australian Story - All Consuming - Kate Reid
programme.desc: Kate Reid's croissants have been called the world's best. But how did a Formula 1 engineer battling a near-fatal eating disorder end up perfecting pastry?

programme.title: Killer Whale: Australia's Megapod
programme.desc: Orca are the apex predators of the ocean. A recently discovered population in Bremer Bay, WA has managed to achieve the impossible - hunt and kill a blue whale - the largest animal to ever live. So, how did they do it?

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wombat Kingdom - Wombat Kingdom
programme.desc: Known as the bulldozers of the bush, wombats are Australia's largest burrowing animals. Aaron Pedersen explores how their digging has transformed landscapes and changed the face of the continent.

programme.title: ALF S1 E02 - Strangers In The Night
programme.desc: It's out-of-this-world mayhem, mischief and madness for the whole family when ALF, 'Alien Life Form' crashes into the Tanner family's world.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels S5 E08 - Moonshinin' Angels
programme.desc: A series of challenging cases take the angels around the world to fight crimes, on behalf of their enigmatic millionaire boss, Charlie.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S1 E08 - Mother Jefferson's Boyfriend
programme.desc: With his dry-cleaning business booming, George Jefferson moves his family--level-headed wife Louise and son Lionel to the upper east side. But life in a luxurious Manhattan high-rise holds unexpected pitfalls for George.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S1 E09 - Meet The Press
programme.desc: With his dry-cleaning business booming, George Jefferson moves his family--level-headed wife Louise and son Lionel to the upper east side. But life in a luxurious Manhattan high-rise holds unexpected pitfalls for George.

programme.desc: Famed mystery writer Jessica Fletcher has a gift for solving mysteries and murder always follows her around, whether it be to the houses of her seemingly endless number of friends, nieces, and nephews, or right in her hometown.

programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.desc: Lee Majors stars as Steve Austin, a U.S. astronaut who is critically injured upon re-entry, and whose damaged limbs are replaced with bionic, atomic-powered appendages. Now equipped with impressive capabilities, Austin uses his powers to fight for justice.

programme.desc: From behind the Iron Curtain to the jungles of Central America, Mission: Impossible really amps up the action with a parade of double agents, a chameleon-like assassin, and even a female dictator.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: Encroach
programme.desc: University freshman Zhen Xin finds her classmates, except You Mei, very unfriendly to her, and the two quickly became good friends. Zhen Xin lives in the dormitory and constantly hears strange noises. When she was attacked by a man in black, You Mei saved her and the latter’s identity is also revealed.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Creepy Pasta
programme.desc: Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: City Confidential
programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: Paranormal: Caught On Camera (S3)
programme.desc: A paranormal investigative team is stunned by an unsettling capture on their thermal imaging camera. A mother and daughter are profoundly moved by a particularly beautiful UFO sighting.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: OJ’s behaviour sparks a media frenzy, culminating in a high-profile trial. His ongoing violence raises concerns about what happened to Sydney and Justin.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Linda Carty was sentenced to death on February 19, 2001 for the kidnapping of three-day-old newborn Ray Cabrera, and the kidnapping and murder of his mother, Joana Rodriguez.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When a Christian ranch hand, Dan Lavigne, 52, is shot dead on his porch in Montana, 2002, deputies find no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 73-year-old murder suspect trashes the interrogation room; a married mother of three admits to a 26-year-old cold case killing; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Investigators interrogate a prison inmate about an unsolved serial killer case from the 90s; a former police sergeant is questioned about the murder of his mistress; and more.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A robber and a jewellery store owner get into a Wild West-style shootout; a stay-at-home mom confronts a coffee shop clerk who used her credit card; a father and son duo fight back against a robbery.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A prison librarian is held hostage by a desperate inmate who holds a shank to his neck; a motorcyclist and his girlfriend are attacked in the street; a porch pirate is busted; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: When a Tulsa man is killed by a bullet to the head, detectives discover guns hidden in the garage next door. The neighbor's role becomes a question in a case of cousin against cousin.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Two boys find their mother in the back of her car, Tulsa detectives turn to her family for help catching her killer. But the defendant's testimony leaves the prosecution's case hanging.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When Linda Slaten is brutally strangled in her Lakeland, FL, home, a web of suspects emerges. The case takes a dramatic turn when a DNA hit exposes the sinister underbelly of this peaceful community.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Kahit Wala Ka Na
programme.desc: Irene is torn between her selfish and immature husband and her considerate neighbour. She is forced to choose between the two when her son, tired of the constant fighting, runs away from home.

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 8
programme.desc: ‘Di Na Muli tells the story of a young woman who tries to overcome her life's biggest regret (complicated by her special ability to see how much time remains of someone’s life) but ends up falling in love with the man who caused the death of her one great lov

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 19
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 100
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 20
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: For the Love ep 12
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Barrio Kulimlim ep 2
programme.desc: Family and fate intertwine in this dark story of old rituals and a parallel shadow universe where sacrifices of blood ensures that the small town of Quatro Santo remains wealthy and prosperous. A mother and daughter with old ties return to the place where their ancestors once tried to flee, only to find themselves trying to escape a darker destiny.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 20
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 100
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 13
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
